mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (user_id, product_id, quantity, is_selected, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{userId}, #{productId}, #{quantity}, #{isSelected}, NOW(), NOW()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE quantity = quantity + VALUES(quantity), updated_at = NOW()
mapper.select: SELECT c.*, p.title as "product.title", p.description as "product.description", p.price as "product.price", p.stock as "product.stock", p.condition as "product.condition", p.seller_id as "product.sellerId", u.username as "product.sellerName", p.status as "product.status" FROM cart c LEFT JOIN products p ON c.product_id = p.product_id LEFT JOIN users u ON p.seller_id = u.user_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.seller_id, c.created_at DESC
